subject: Pedals suddenly show up as disconnected
description_text:
Hello,
I have new plus x pedals. They worked normally for 1 race, then suddenly
they no longer connect on the software, it shows up as disconnected all the
time no matter what I do and is not recognized my the simsons software or
the game. I tried changing usb ports, plugging it into a 3.0 port with no
USB hubs. I made the pore cable is working, there id a green LED lighting
up. I also updated the software and firware to latest versions and the
games are also updated (acc and LMU) But it still show up as disconnected
in red box on the sismons software. Please help, I've been trying to
troubleshoot for days with no luck.

Baraa Amir

conversations.body_text: Hi baraa amir,     Please follow the steps below:  1. Enter Firmware Upgrade Mode    Press and hold the “Upgrade” button on the PlusX control box;    While holding the button, reinsert the USB cable;    Release the button once the software shows “Entered Firmware Upgrade Mode”.    2. Manually Restore Firmware    In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update;    Select the firmware file path: pedals-firmware-pedals-plusx.sfu;    Wait for the upgrade to complete, then reinsert the USB and test the pedals again.
